artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Blue, drk teal, olive warp. Drk teal, kelly & metallic blue weft. Twill. Machine edged all 4 sides. Stapled to inside mat folder with Larsen descriptive label. "H-8B" written on outside of folder. (blue, green)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Pomegranate%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1953
title: Pomegranate
